item.title: rPI - How to run a web app at boot in full screen kiosk mode on a raspberryPI
item.description: This tutorial shows how to setup a rPI, with default raspbian OS, to load at startup the chromium browser in full screen. Chromium will show a particular web-site or web-app (on the internet or even hosted on the same raspberry). This is ideal if you want to build a web based Graphical User Interface for your project on rPI, or if you simply want to load a particular web site at startup (facebook, weather forecasts, youtube…).
